abstract: Robert Pierpoint, CBS News correspondent who brought a human-interest touch to coverage of the Korean War and later reported on six presidents from Dwight D Eisenhower to Jimmy Carter, dies at age 86.
snippet: At CBS News, Robert Pierpoint brought a human touch to his coverage, which included the Korean War and six American presidencies.
lead_paragraph: At CBS News, Robert Pierpoint brought a human touch to his coverage, which included the Korean War and six American presidencies.

headline.main: Robert Pierpoint, 86, Dies; CBS News Correspondent
headline.print_headline: Robert Pierpoint, 86, Dies; CBS News Correspondent
headline.seo: Robert Pierpoint, 86, Dies; Correspondent for CBS News
